DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Asia. The aim of this observational study is to collect efficacy and safety data of biphasic insulin aspart (NovoMixÂ® 30) in type 2 diabetes under normal clinical practice conditions.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Biphasic Insulin Aspart 30 for the Treatment of Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec, insulin aspart drug combination
Insulin aspart, insulin aspart protamine drug combination 30:70
DOC.criteria: Subjects from hospitals or clinics, diagnosed with type 2 diabetes mellitus
